action.action-desc: Mr. Lewis of Georgia introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to encourage the placement of released Federal prisoners in residential reentry centers near their homes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Community Reentry Act of 2017.

Section 3624(c)(1) of title 18, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following: Subject to the availability of appropriations and of bed space availability, the Director shall place a prisoner in a residential reentry center that is within 50 miles of the prisonerâ€™s previous or anticipated permanent legal address..
